Package FOMS.account_manager

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IStaffFilter
    The IStaffFilter interface defines a contract for filtering a list of UserCredentials objects.
    IStaffListEditor
    The IStaffListEditor interface defines a contract for editing a staff list.
    PasswordManager
    The PasswordManager interface provides methods for password verification and update.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ABaseAddStaff
    Abstract base class for adding staff members.
    ABaseRemoveStaff
    Abstract base class for removing staff members.
    AddAdmin
    Class for adding administrative staff members.
    AddManager
    The AddManager class is responsible for adding a manager to the system.
    AddStaff
    The AddStaff class is responsible for adding a staff member to the system.
    AgeFilter  
    AStaffListEditor
    Base class for editing staff lists.
    AStaffTransfer
    Abstract base class for transferring staff members.
    BranchFilter
    Filters UserCredentials based on branch.
    ConcreteTransferManager
    Concrete implementation for transferring managers in the system.
    ConcreteTransferStaff
    Concrete implementation for transferring staff members in the system.
    FileIOHandler
    The FileIOHandler class provides static methods for reading from and writing to files.
    GenderFilter
    The GenderFilter class implements the IStaffFilter interface to filter a list of UserCredentials based on gender.
    InitializationHandler
    The InitializationHandler class provides methods for initializing and managing staff credentials.
    LoginController
    The LoginController class manages user login and password-related operations.
    PasswordUtils
    The PasswordUtils class provides utility methods for generating and hashing passwords.
    PromoteStaff
    The PromoteStaff class allows for promoting a staff member to a higher role, such as Manager.
    ReadStaffList
    The ReadStaffList class provides methods for reading staff credentials from a file.
    RemoveAllStaff
    The RemoveAllStaff class provides functionality to remove all staff members from a specified branch.
    RemoveManager
    The RemoveManager class provides functionality to remove a manager from the system.
    RemoveStaff
    The RemoveStaff class provides functionality to remove a staff member from the system.
    RoleFilter
    The RoleFilter class implements the IStaffFilter interface to filter staff members by their role.
    SimplePasswordManager
    The SimplePasswordManager class implements the PasswordManager interface to manage user passwords.
    UserCredentials
    The UserCredentials class represents the credentials of a user in the system.
    ViewFilteredStaffList
    The ViewFilteredStaffList class provides functionality to filter and display staff members based on various criteria.
    ViewStaffList
    The ViewStaffList class provides functionality to display all staff members.
